(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (JJ Japanese) (NN food))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (RB so) (JJ popular))
        (ADVP (RB nowadays))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP am)
        (ADJP (JJ sure)
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP
                (NP (DT some))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS readers))))
              (VP (MD would)
                (VP (VB like)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (ADJP (JJ able)
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB put)
                                (PRT (RP together))
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT some) (JJ simple) (JJ Japanese) (NNS dishes))
                                  (PP (IN at)
                                    (NP (NN home))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


amod(food-2, Japanese-1)
nsubj(popular-5, food-2)
cop(popular-5, is-3)
advmod(popular-5, so-4)
root(ROOT-0, popular-5)
advmod(popular-5, nowadays-6)
cc(popular-5, and-7)
nsubj(sure-10, I-8)
cop(sure-10, am-9)
conj(popular-5, sure-10)
mark(like-17, that-11)
nsubj(like-17, some-12)
prep(some-12, of-13)
poss(readers-15, our-14)
pobj(of-13, readers-15)
aux(like-17, would-16)
ccomp(sure-10, like-17)
aux(able-20, to-18)
cop(able-20, be-19)
xcomp(like-17, able-20)
aux(put-22, to-21)
xcomp(able-20, put-22)
prt(put-22, together-23)
det(dishes-27, some-24)
amod(dishes-27, simple-25)
amod(dishes-27, Japanese-26)
dobj(put-22, dishes-27)
prep(dishes-27, at-28)
pobj(at-28, home-29)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN started)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ new) (NN series))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS videos))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (VP (VBZ covers)
                    (NP (DT some)
                      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ basic))
                      (NP (JJ Japanese) (NNS dishes)))))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(started-4, So-1)
nsubj(started-4, I-2)
aux(started-4, have-3)
root(ROOT-0, started-4)
det(series-7, a-5)
amod(series-7, new-6)
dobj(started-4, series-7)
prep(series-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, videos-9)
nsubj(covers-11, which-10)
rcmod(videos-9, covers-11)
det(dishes-16, some-12)
advmod(basic-14, very-13)
amod(dishes-16, basic-14)
amod(dishes-16, Japanese-15)
dobj(covers-11, dishes-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Today) (PRP we))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBG going)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB tackle)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (RBS most) (JJ basic))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNS dishes)))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(going-4, Today-1)
dep(Today-1, we-2)
aux(going-4, are-3)
root(ROOT-0, going-4)
aux(tackle-6, to-5)
xcomp(going-4, tackle-6)
det(basic-9, the-7)
advmod(basic-9, most-8)
dobj(tackle-6, basic-9)
prep(basic-9, of-10)
pobj(of-10, dishes-11)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN namely))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, namely-1)


(ROOT
  (NP (JJ steamed) (NN rice) (. .)))


amod(rice-2, steamed-1)
root(ROOT-0, rice-2)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (ADVP (RB Later))
      (IN in)
      (NP (DT the) (NN series)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(in-2, Later-1)
root(ROOT-0, in-2)
det(series-4, the-3)
pobj(in-2, series-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (MD will)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBG covering)
          (NP (NN miso) (NN soup)))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(covering-5, we-1)
aux(covering-5, will-2)
advmod(covering-5, also-3)
aux(covering-5, be-4)
root(ROOT-0, covering-5)
nn(soup-7, miso-6)
dobj(covering-5, soup-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB charshu)
      (NP (NN ramen)
        (CC and)
        (NNS chawanmushi)))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, charshu-1)
dobj(charshu-1, ramen-2)
cc(ramen-2, and-3)
conj(ramen-2, chawanmushi-4)
